weapons.name: AK-47
weapons.description: The AK-47, officially known as the Avtomat Kalashnikova (Russian: Автомат Калашникова, lit. 'Kalashnikov's automatic [rifle]'; also known as the Kalashnikov or just AK), is a gas-operated assault rifle that is chambered for the 7.62×39mm cartridge.

weapons.name: AUG
weapons.description: The Steyr AUG (German: Armee-Universal-Gewehr, lit. 'army universal rifle') is an Austrian bullpup assault rifle chambered for the 5.56×45mm NATO intermediate cartridge, designed in the 1960s by Steyr-Daimler-Puch, and now manufactured by Steyr Arms GmbH & Co KG.

weapons.name: M4A4
weapons.description: The M4A4 is a Counter-Terrorist rifle featured in Counter-Strike: Global Offensive & Counter-Strike 2, replacing the previous Maverick M4A1 Carbine. In Global Offensive, it has the M4A1-S as its alternative loadout.

weapons.name: AWP
weapons.description: Considered a "high risk, high reward" weapon due to its high powers but slow firing rate, reload speed, and movement speed, the AWP is one of the most used weapons in the Counter-Strike series.
